title: Zita speaking Twi and Dagaare | Ghanaian languages | Wikitongues
content: [speaking Twi] Ghanaians, I greet you all It's me, Zita and I am speaking to you from Stockholm, Sweden I work for the Global Open Initiative Foundation And the work that we do is We teach people exactly how they can use Wikipedia [shy laughter] how to upload content on Wikipedia And what many don't know is Just like we have an English Wikipedia There is also a Twi Wikipedia that you can use So, loved ones My father, my siblings, everyone I'm pleading with you If you don't know how to use Wiki Please contact me and I can show you how it works [speaking Dagaare] ...
